website_summaries.verdict: Efficient and consistent in terms of quality waffle creation.
pros: Minimal fuss needed for easy-to-make waffles that are even more fun to eat
A great introductory waffle maker for those who aren't confident in the kitchen, but crave great results
cons: Some reviews note the waffle maker is hard to clean

customer_reviews.title: Does not brown waffles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle iron because my teenage daughter makes waffles for breakfast every day so it was worth it to me to spend substantially more for this product; however, I was disappointed that this waffle iron didn't work as I thought it would. As noted by many other reviewers this waffle iron does not get my waffle's brown and crispy. I make Kodiak Power Cakes with milk and an extra egg and no matter how long I cooked the waffle they would not crisp up. Maybe it's just this brand of waffles. The 2 star rating is because this waffle iron is incredibly well built and will undoubtedly last forever. I think more wattage would make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: mark s. french

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing waffle maker, we are so happy with the purchase. It is easy to use and clean. The waffles turn out perfect everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: The description said it was a cast iron waffle maker ...
customer_reviews.text: The description said it was a cast iron waffle maker and it is NOT cast iron. It is aluminum. Please fix that for the next unsuspecting person looking for a CAST IRON waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: This is, without a doubt, the best waffle maker ever! It makes big, fluffy waffles with a bit of a crunch. You can use the auto settings or manual to get the perfect waffle texture that you are hungry for. Clean up in easy-there is no mess!
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best waffle maker I have ever had. There is more surface area to volume ratio with this waffle maker. That makes the waffles more crisp and really adds to the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The best waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: The preheat start so you don't have to guess when to start.The color setting, I don't know why you set it on 4 unless you like very brown waffles
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've all brands of waffle makers and this is by far the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve own more waffle irons than I can count over the past 25 years. This is hands down the best, and the last I will ever purchase. Cooks evenly and perfectly every time, and super easy, fast clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Nravelee29

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but a Cadillac
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a quality waffle maker that not only made great waffles but was well designed and constructed. I read the reviews on many waffle makerso and this one stood out. Unfortunately it was also more expensive by a fair margin. However I was looking to purchase one that would last. So having said that It is well constructed and has a professional appearance. Iis easy to use and easy to clean. In fact at this point I hardly have to clean it. The waffles lift right out without leaving any residue. Time will tell on the longevity and I hope not to test the customer service. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: JQS

customer_reviews.title: Best waffles ever!
customer_reviews.text: The entire family likes this waffle maker very much. A great purchase, even at the somewhat high price.
customer_reviews.author: Arden M. Setterberg

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We've just gotten this for Christmas and have only used it once, but it turned out beautiful waffles! Nicely browned and crispy! We actually made vegan waffles from a recipe by The Vegan 8. There is no butter or oil in the recipe, and I didn't need spray oil or nonstick spray on the waffle maker either! I used a wooden skewer to pull the edge up after the waffle cooked, and then a spatula to lift it out the rest of the way. We made 3 batches of waffles, and nothing stuck! I love Breville products! The quality is always great!
customer_reviews.author: tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly simple waffles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Perfect waffles the very first time. I had not made waffles in years, this waffle iron made it so easy that I felt super confident. Temps are excellently regulated and just allowing the machine to do its job is all that is necessary. Clean up is a snap, just sponge off the plates while the iron is still warm and you are finished. I have several Breville products and they have all performed wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: panda belle

customer_reviews.title: That price though...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t tryna’ spend $180.00 on a waffle iron, but that’s the way of the world today. Nonetheless, that’s the only negative I can report so far. The moat is a plus, but still, measure 4 ozs or a half cup, per waffle, when attempting your first batch. After that, you’ll be able to eyeball your fills without measuring. Basically, fill the bottom plates just above the squares and just below or up to the contain lines.
customer_reviews.author: 4renzixs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic waffle maker. Two waffles cook quickly to make several more in no time. Non-stick plates are terrific, waffles lift out via fork with little to no effort. The buzzer lets you know when the waffles are done. Couldn't ask for more. Very happy with this appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Life Elevated

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Heavy lid which is great. The grates should pop out, cleaning is a pain. The beep that tells you the waffle is dine quit working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: ARose

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best waffler maker I have used
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best waffler maker I have used. They always come out perfect, and there is almost no cleanup.... just wipe it down between uses. I particularly like that it tells you when it is up to temperature via a sound and then prompts you when the waffle is done... I can straighten up the kitchen for a few minutes while my waffles cook and not worry about over cooking them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

product_meta.title: Breville 2-Slice Smart Waffle Pro Maker
product_meta.description: Meet the Waffle Maker that knows exactly how to turn batter into the precise creation your appetite desires. Turning sticky batter into golden brown goodness isn’t always easy. Let the Smart Waffle Pro do the thinking for you. Choose your waffle style, from light to dark and rest assured any overflow will get caught and cooked in the wrap around moat. No mess
feature_bullets: Stainless steel finish, Cast Aluminum Cooking Plates
Deep cooking tray for fluffier waffle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
